reviews.review_msg: She's always late- without fail. its ok because im always late too, but that might bother other people. i dont think she's anything special- it doesnt feel like she puts any extra effort in but shes nice. she doesn't ever hand anything back like writing exercies so you don't really know how you're doing. she's not very inspiring.

The best prof I've ever had! The class was tough, but she was always there to help, and most importantly able to explain things in different ways. Also, she designs the class for what the students want to take from it. Fantastic teacher! Take a course with her if you can!
By far one of the best teachers I have ever had.  very experienced, helpful, insightful, entertaining, understanding, and encouraging.

this was my first french course that i took after high school and it made me not want to take another one! she was nice but a tough marker. not a lot of people in the class were doing well! she expects you to know more than has been taught!
